Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Board
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The base JPanel where the drones will fight
    Author:
    Baykam Say

        Parameters:
        lasers - The lasers that will be updated

      • updatePlayerDrone

        private void updatePlayerDrone()
        Updates the player drone. Calls the onScannedDrone() method if the player drone sees another drone. Ends the game if the player drone is dead.

      • updateEnemyDrone

        private void updateEnemyDrone()
        Updates the enemy drone. Calls the onScannedDrone() method if the enemy drone sees another drone. Ends the game if the enemy drone is dead.

        d - The drone
